Package org.annotation.agschema.graphics.vtree

Component for drawing trees vertically

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TreeMutationListener Listens for mutations of a tree.
VTreeCellRenderer Similar to the CellRenderer in the javax.swing.tree package.
VTreeExpansionListener Listen for expansion events.
VTreeExpansionState Maintains the state of expansion/collapse of the nodes in a tree from the perspective of viewing.
VTreeSelectionListener  
VTreeSelectionModel There are two parameters to the selection model.
 

Class Summary
TreeMutationSupport Convenience class that maintains a set of listeners and notifies them of the appropriate event.
VTreeCanvas  
VTreeCanvasTest  
VTreeCellRendererImpl Expansion and focus are not handled yet.
VTreeExpansionStateImpl A simple implementation of the expansion state.
VTreeSelectionModelImpl Implementation of the selection model interface.
 

Package org.annotation.agschema.graphics.vtree Description

Component for drawing trees vertically
